Name: The Staring Point
Desc: It came from an ancient extraterrestrial civilization, but its true purpose is yet to be identified. Surprisingly, it gives those passing by a home-like, warm feeling. What could it be...?

Name: Norman Star Mine
Desc: A wandering mine that traveled all the way from a distant blue planet. It has long been abandoned, but is still producing shiny Star Ore relentlessly.

Name: Star Training Field
Desc: Noctis never liked this training method, but No. 21 has a different view on it. She believes if Noctis were to run a shop, it would close down within a week.

Name: Virtual Range
Desc: "The lack of virtual shooting range to simulate interstellar wars is the fundamental reason for loss!" Said the owner who refused to disclose their name.

Name: "Dawnlight" Bar
Desc: "The cruising electrolyte made by the pink owner has a warm, gentle taste."

Name: Brilliance Observatory
Desc: The owner of the observatory had embarked on a journey through the universe. She left starry gifts and blessing songs for travelers passing by.

Name: Leap Star Tower
Desc: The deserted tower silently narrates the history of struggles of ancient civilizations. It can still be of help even on a barren planet.

Name: Frozen Mountain
Desc: "Someone once used the glaciers from an entire planet to create a marvelous artwork. It was but 'a tip of the iceberg.'"

Name: Eternal Glacier
Desc: The ice has frozen all sins and memories. Everything awaits for awakening in silence.

Name: Gigantic Iceberg
Desc: It has no special effect but can hardly be destroyed.
